sentences.sContent: He left his bicycle leaning against a tree trunk.
sentences.sCn: 他把他的自行车斜靠在树干上。

sentences.sContent: Maloney unlocked his trunk and took out some coveralls.
sentences.sCn: 马洛尼把他的大箱子的锁打开了，拿出了一些工作服。

synos.tran: 树干；躯干；象鼻；汽车车尾的行李箱
[航][铁路]干线的；躯干的；箱子的

phrases.pCn: 干线；中继线，长途电话线

remMethod.val: 喝醉(drunk)了酒， 倒在树干(trunk)上酣睡

trans.tranOther: the thick central woody stem of a tree
